xuiBreadcrumb
directive in module xui

Description

Used for display of a trail of links, signifying a path back to the root. NOTE: If there is only one item in the bound array, breadcrumbs will not be shown

Usage

as element:
<xui-breadcrumb
       crumbs="{IBreadcrumb []}">
</xui-breadcrumb>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
crumbsIBreadcrumb []

Array of breadcrumbs {title, url}.

Example
